amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To All
amendatorysection.catchline: Issuance of bonds; consent or other conditions not required.
amendatorysection.para: Bonds may be issued under sections 18-2724 to 18-2736 without obtaining the consent of any department, division, commission, board, bureau, or instrumentality of this state and without any other proceedings or the happening of any other conditions or things than those proceedings, conditions, or things which are specifically required therefor by such sections, and the validity of and security for any bonds shall not be affected by the existence or nonexistence of any such consent or other proceedings, conditions, or things.
